mapper.select: SELECT a.`menu_code` , a.`menu_name` , a.`menu_address` , a.`menu_url` , a.`menu_icon` , b.`menu_code` AS s_menu_code, b.`menu_name` AS s_menu_name, b.`menu_address` AS s_menu_address , b.`menu_url` AS s_menu_url FROM system_menu a LEFT JOIN system_menu b ON a.`menu_code` = b.`parent_code` LEFT JOIN system_role_menu AS rm ON a.menu_code = rm.menu_code OR b.menu_code = rm.menu_code LEFT JOIN system_role AS r ON r.role_code = rm.role_code LEFT JOIN system_user_role AS ur ON ur.role_code = r.role_code LEFT JOIN SYSTEM_USER AS u ON ur.user_code = u.user_code WHERE b.isvalid = 1 AND a.`isvalid` = 1 AND r.isvalid = 1 AND u.isvalid = 1 AND u.`user_code` = #{userCode} GROUP BY a.id,b.`id` ORDER BY a.order_num
